# Cross-spectrum computation

**API Collection**

Compute the element-wise product of a vector and the conjugate of a second vector.

## Vector-to-Vector Spectra Computation

- **vDSP_zcspec**: Computes the cross-spectrum of two complex single-precision vectors.
- **vDSP_zcspecD**: Computes the cross-spectrum of two complex double-precision vectors.

## Vector-to-vector spectra and coherence computation

- **Autospectrum computation**: Compute the element-wise sum of the squares of the real and imaginary parts of a complex vector.
- **Coherence function computation**: Compute the coherence of two vectors.
